#include<iostream>
#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int revers(int a);
int main()
{
    int a,b,t,n,d,i,c;
    cin >> t;
    while(t--){
        cin >> a;
        cin >> b;
        c = revers(a);
        d = revers(b);
        n = d + c;
        i = revers(n);
        cout << i << endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
int revers(int a)
{
    int r,sum = 0;
    while(a != 0){
        r = a % 10;
        sum = sum * 10 + r;
        a = a/10;
    }
    return sum;
}
